data.lyric:
[ti:Soon You_ll Get Better]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Lover]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Soon You'll Get Better (feat. Dixie Chicks) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)/The Chicks
[00:03.37]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/Jack Antonoff
[00:06.74]Composed by：Taylor Swift/Jack Antonoff
[00:10.11]The buttons of my coat were tangled in my hair
[00:14.62]In doctor's office lighting I didn't tell you I was scared
[00:21.66]That was the first time we were there
[00:24.20]Holy orange bottles each night I pray to you
[00:28.74]Desperate people find faith so now I pray to Jesus too
[00:35.60]And I'll say to you
[00:36.62]Taylor Swift/Dixie Chicks：
[00:37.21]Ooh-ah
[00:39.32]Soon you'll get better
[00:42.04]Ooh-ah
[00:44.03]Soon you'll get better
[00:46.63]Ooh-ah
[00:49.35]You'll get better soon
[00:54.06]'Cause you have to
[00:56.08]Taylor Swift：
[01:05.48]I know delusion when I see it in the mirror
[01:10.06]You like the nicer nurses you make the best of a bad deal
[01:16.93]I just pretend it isn't real
[01:19.24]I'll paint the kitchen neon I'll brighten up the sky
[01:23.85]I know I'll never get it there's not a day that I won't try
[01:31.32]And I'll say to you
[01:32.16]Taylor Swift/Dixie Chicks：
[01:32.84]Ooh-ah
[01:34.75]Soon you'll get better
[01:37.38]Ooh-ah
[01:39.42]Soon you'll get better
[01:41.93]Ooh-ah
[01:44.67]You'll get better soon
[01:49.42]'Cause you have to
[01:50.69]Taylor Swift/Dixie Chicks：
[01:52.15]And I hate to make this all about me
[01:58.00]But who am I supposed to talk to
[02:02.81]What am I supposed to do
[02:08.25]If there's no you
[02:11.65]Taylor Swift：
[02:12.43]This won't go back to normal if it ever was
[02:17.24]It's been years of hoping
[02:19.34]And I keep saying it because
[02:23.90]'Cause I have to
[02:25.09]Taylor Swift/Dixie Chicks：
[02:25.94]Ooh-ah
[02:28.65]You'll get better
[02:30.55]Ooh-ah
[02:32.51]Soon you'll get better
[02:35.10]Ooh
[02:37.81]You'll get better soon
[02:44.45]Ooh-ah
[02:46.32]Soon you'll get better
[02:48.92]Ooh-ah
[02:50.90]Soon you'll get better
[02:53.46]Ooh-ah
[02:56.17]You'll get better soon
[03:01.07]'Cause you have to
data.trans:
[ti:Soon You_ll Get Better]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Lover]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.37]//
[00:06.74]//
[00:10.11]将头埋进外套里 我的头发缠在上衣的纽扣上
[00:14.62]医生办公室里晃眼的灯光下 我不曾告诉你我有多害怕
[00:21.66]那应该是我们第一次都这样惴惴不安
[00:24.20]那些珍贵的橘色药瓶啊 每一夜我都为你祈祷
[00:28.74]绝望的人总会寻找信仰 所以如今我也会向耶稣虔诚祷告
[00:35.60]而我会坚定的告诉你
[00:36.62]//
[00:37.21]//
[00:39.32]你很快就会好起来的
[00:42.04]//
[00:44.03]你很快就会好起来的
[00:46.63]//
[00:49.35]你很快就会康复的
[00:54.06]因为你一定会好好地
[00:56.08]//
[01:05.48]当我看着镜中的你 我知道那一切不过是幻觉
[01:10.06]你喜欢漂亮的护士 即便是绝境你也能乐观面对
[01:16.93]我只是自欺欺人假装这一切都不是真的
[01:19.24]我会将厨房涂上抢眼颜色 我要照亮你的世界
[01:23.85]我知道我无法如愿以偿 但每一天我都没有放弃努力
[01:31.32]而我会坚定的告诉你
[01:32.16]//
[01:32.84]//
[01:34.75]你很快就会好起来的
[01:37.38]//
[01:39.42]你很快就会好起来的
[01:41.93]//
[01:44.67]你很快就会康复的
[01:49.42]因为你一定会好好地
[01:50.69]//
[01:52.15]我讨厌自说自话
[01:58.00]但如果我的世界没有你
[02:02.81]我又该跟谁倾诉心声
[02:08.25]又该何去何从
[02:11.65]//
[02:12.43]我们的生活难再重回平淡 即便曾经如此
[02:17.24]这么多年来 我一直怀揣希望
[02:19.34]我一直念念不忘只因为
[02:23.90]因为我一定会
[02:25.09]//
[02:25.94]//
[02:28.65]让你好起来的
[02:30.55]//
[02:32.51]你很快就会好起来的
[02:35.10]//
[02:37.81]你很快就会康复的
[02:44.45]//
[02:46.32]你很快就会好起来的
[02:48.92]//
[02:50.90]你很快就会好起来的
[02:53.46]//
[02:56.17]你很快就会康复的
[03:01.07]因为你一定会好好地
